channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023101319
item.description:
Report X-2023101319

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: HOT SPRINGS NATIONAL PARK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was unloaded, paint was noticed on bottom edge of the box. Upon closer inspection QA noticed that one of the 3 paint cans was leaking. Package brought to QA area and bagged. DescribePack: This can appears to be leaking through the side of the can where the metal handle is attached, only on one side of the can. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Box was placed in HazMat bag until we could inspect it.
